sys_hub_flow.name: Close Overdue NeedIt Tasks

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: checks the date of tasks to determine if overdue

sys_element_mapping.value: NeedIt Task {{54f01efb-9c1b-4433-aab6-5d4e396d29de.item.number}} was automatically closed because its due date of {{54f01efb-9c1b-4433-aab6-5d4e396d29de.item.due_date}} was older than the autoCloseOverdue setting of {{d580b30a-86e2-42a6-a8c4-372804d632c2.property_value}} days

sys_hub_sub_flow_instance_inputs.label: Wait For Completion
sys_hub_sub_flow_instance_inputs.name: var__m_sys_hub_sub_flow_instance_inputs_f2633eb497462110e76c3c7e6253afca
